DOC.brief_summary: This study compare safety efficacy generic Fluticasone Furoate ( Lek Pharmaceuticals ) Nasal Spray reference list drug treatment seasonal allergic rhinitis . Additionally test reference formulation test superiority placebo nasal spray .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Comparing Two Fluticasone Furoate Nasal Sprays Relief Signs Symptoms Seasonal Allergic Rhinitis
DOC.criteria: Male nonpregnant , nonlactating female 12 year age old minimum 2 year previous history seasonal allergic rhinitis pollen/allergen season time study conduct . Signed informed consent ( assent ) form . Documented positive allergic skin test local pollen . Sufficient Symptom Scores . History asthma require chronic therapy ( exception occasional acute mild exercise induce asthma ) . Some past concomitant medical condition , prohibit medication . Upper respiratory tract infection untreated infection . Patient start immunotherapy/changed dose . Any known allergy component study nasal spray .
DOC.keyword: Rhinitis , allergic , seasonal , fluticasone furoate , equivalence
